byline.original: By JAY SCHREIBER and SETH BERKMAN

abstract: Alex Rodriguez receives baseball he smacked for his 3,000th hit from fan Zack Hample, in exchange for which he will donate $150,000 to charity; Rodriguez also resolves dispute he had with New York Yankees about $6 million bonus for hitting 660th home run.
lead_paragraph: Rodriguez, who will receive the ball from his 3,000th hit from a fan before Friday’s game, also settled his dispute with the Yankees over a career home run bonus.

headline.main: Two Deals for Alex Rodriguez: One for Ball, One for Bonus
headline.print_headline: Two Deals for Rodriguez: One for Milestone Ball, One for Home Run Bonus

snippet: Rodriguez, who will receive the ball from his 3,000th hit from a fan before Friday’s game, also settled his dispute with the Yankees over a career home run bonus.
